post.body: I completely agree. It illustrates I like the music for its musical quality, not my perceptions of its artist.
not at all, i like music without ever knowing who or what it is ALL the time.
Portal is amazing.
Little caesar's pizza, breadsticks, and a sprite zero
Maybe not with something like a phone, but yes. I do that all the time.
Wall-E makes me happy. :) G'night all!
I'm still trying to figure this twitter mobile thing out!
I'm too jittery for this time of night. I need to calm down somehow. Bubble bath?
Oh em gee! Twitter text! How cool! Haha, i'm such a dork.
john green is awesome
ugh. the tension makes me feel physically ill.
I wish had fruit in this house! M goodness, all there is to eat is junk.
Procrastinating....I hate cleaning my room
Time to take a shower!
I'm tired! Now I only need to convince the boyfriend it's time to go to bed.
I wish I had some peppermint tea...
Watching episodes of Pingu!
My brother ate my candy!
ugh, work. not looking forward to it.
nummy! little caesar's breadsticks are the best!
